full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: Hose, Air Breathing**

**contractingEntityName**: Department of National Defence (DND)

**tenderReference**: cb-562-72440234

**tenderStatus**: Open

**tenderMethod**: Competitive – Open Bidding

**tenderDescription**: The DND invites proposals for the supply of Air Breathing Hoses, one (1) type, in support of the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) 25 Combat Fighter Squadron (25 CFSD) in Montreal.

**Scope of Work**: The successful bidder will be required to deliver 50 items, GSIN: 4720, NSN: 01-389-2492, MBEU147724-1, NCAGE: U1604, to the 25CFSD Montreal by March 31, 2025.

**Proposal Guidelines**: The proposal package must include the following:

    A detailed description of the Item being offered
    Proof of compliance with the specification requirements as outlined
    Justification for the price quoted
    Brand name, model, part number and NCAGE for Equivalent or Substitute Products

**Proposal Submission**: Bidders are encouraged to submit their proposals electronically via the epost Connect service. However, other methods of bid delivery may be accepted in exceptional circumstances. The tender documents can be downloaded from [lien].

**Timeline**:

    Tender Closing Date: January 7, 2025, 14:00
    Award Date: To be determined after evaluation
    Contract Start Date: January 7, 2025
    Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

**Language**: The RFP documents can be obtained in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information**:

    Dany Lebel
    Department of National Defence
    Phone: (000) 000-0000
    Email: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
    Address: 101 Colonel by Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

Please note that this tender is subject to the provisions of the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and other applicable regulations.
